attributes.action: ban companies from signing up employees to 'slave contracts'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies seem to think it is perfectly fine to hire someone for a yearly salary and make them work as many hours as they see fit, whether its 16 hour days, 7 day weeks etc. This has a major effect on family life, and on health. Companies should be banned from creating contracts that allow them to get their employees to work any hours they ask. Each employee should work for an hourly rate, and have a set overtime rate.
